name: Mr. Barnett's Business
description:
Hello Mr. Barnett, welcome to the stock market! This is a place where you can make and lose money very fast!

Mr. Barnett's Business is a stock market game where you can buy and sell shares from three companies: Economics Inc., Budgetstock Inc. and Goldboy Inc.. Your goal is to make as much money as you can!

Controls:

Esc: to quit the game

And everything else is just buttons!
